title: Store settings
body:
It would be great if the store remembered our preferences.
For instance, "Show owned". I want this off 100% of the time.
As someone who owns all but 14 of the Champions, I would like to see the ones I DON'T own when I enter the store.
Every time I want to change it it has to reload the page, which take about 5 seconds on my machine.
My only reason for entering the store is to buy something, and I can't buy what I already own.
The same with the order menu. If I set it so the Champions are displayed in decreasing IP value, I want it to be like that when I come back.
(All of the above applies to the Skins, Gameplay, Accessories, and Bundles tabs of course.)
Those are my thoughts.
Hope to see this change soon. (And in the Alpha Client..... that's where I got frustrated with this)
Keep up the good work Riot!
Benramz {{champion:22}}

replies.body: I would like to have that feature too! I have the exact same problem and my guess is that the guys working on the store would like to have it too. For now we are focusing on reaching parity with the AIR client. Once we deprecate and launch globally the updated client, we'll being to talk more about new features.

I'm guessing the store hasn't been truly ported over right now, but is just being pulled into an iframe or something? So both the old and new client are using the same store, and so changes will have to be compatible for both (for now). I am reading into this correctly?
Get your damn obsolete tag outa my face :p
